mapper.select: select a.aname, a.adt, t.tno, t.ttype, t.tdt, t.ttime, t.tloc, t.tpre, t.tcheck, a.ano from g_app a inner join g_test t on a.ano = t.ano where a.ano = #{ano}
select a.aname, a.adt, t.tno, t.ttype, t.tdt, t.ttime, t.tloc, t.tpre, t.tcheck, a.ano from g_app a inner join g_test t on a.ano = t.ano where t.tno = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into g_test(ttype, tdt, ttime, tloc, tpre, tcheck, ano) values(#{type}, #{date}, #{time}, #{location}, #{prepare}, 0, #{ano})
mapper.update: update g_test set ttype=#{type}, tdt=#{date}, ttime=#{time}, tloc=#{location}, tpre=#{prepare}, tcheck=#{check}, ano=#{ano} where tno=#{no}
